generalFallback.label: Summarize Themes
generalFallback.prompt: Summarize key themes across the most recent documents.

generalFallback.label: Identify Gaps
generalFallback.prompt: What gaps or missing details should I clarify next?

starters.label: Fees (Simple)
starters.prompt: What fees do I pay if I redeem shares of the Vanguard 500 Index Fund within 30 days?

starters.label: Risk Comparison (Moderate)
starters.prompt: Compare the risks of investing in ETFs vs closed-end funds for a conservative investor.

starters.label: Cross-Source Risk & Fees (Advanced)
starters.prompt: Summarize the key risks and the expense ratio from a mutual fund fact sheet and explain how it differs from the 10-K risk disclosure.

starters.label: Sterilization Protocol (Moderate)

starters.prompt: Extract the dosage instructions from an FDA drug label and compare with the DailyMed version. Are they consistent?

starters.label: Torque Spec (Simple)
starters.prompt: What torque value is specified for assembly part 123 on the ZX-200 engine?

starters.label: Airworthiness Directives (Moderate)
